Uses of JavaProcessBuilder in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java
 

Methods in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java that return JavaProcessBuilder
protected  JavaProcessBuilder VirtualizedJavaApplicationBuilder.createJavaProcessBuilder(S schema, String applicationName, ApplicationConsole console)
          Creates a AbstractJavaProcessBuilder, identifiable by the proposed name using the specified JavaApplicationSchema for configuration, using the provided ApplicationConsole for output.
protected  JavaProcessBuilder ExternalJavaApplicationBuilder.createJavaProcessBuilder(S schema, String applicationName, ApplicationConsole console)
          Creates a AbstractJavaProcessBuilder, identifiable by the proposed name using the specified JavaApplicationSchema for configuration, using the provided ApplicationConsole for output.
protected abstract  JavaProcessBuilder AbstractJavaApplicationBuilder.createJavaProcessBuilder(S schema, String applicationName, ApplicationConsole console)
          Creates a AbstractJavaProcessBuilder, identifiable by the proposed name using the specified JavaApplicationSchema for configuration, using the provided ApplicationConsole for output.
 

Uses of JavaProcessBuilder in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.process
 

Classes in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.process that implement JavaProcessBuilder
 class AbstractJavaProcessBuilder
          A AbstractJavaProcessBuilder is a base implementation of a JavaProcessBuilder.
 class ExternalProcessBuilder
          An ExternalProcessBuilder is a JavaProcessBuilder that creates separate non-child Java Processes from the currently executing process.
 class VirtualProcessBuilder
          An implementation of AbstractJavaProcessBuilder that builds an instance of VirtualProcess.
 

Methods in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.process that return JavaProcessBuilder
 JavaProcessBuilder JavaProcessBuilder.addArgument(String argument)
          Adds an argument to the current List of arguments for the next Java Process to be realize()d by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder AbstractJavaProcessBuilder.addArgument(String argument)
          Adds an argument to the current List of arguments for the next Java Process to be realize()d by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder JavaProcessBuilder.addArguments(Iterable<String> arguments)
          Adds the arguments to the current List of arguments for the next Java Process to be realize()d by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder AbstractJavaProcessBuilder.addArguments(Iterable<String> arguments)
          Adds the arguments to the current List of arguments for the next Java Process to be realize()d by this JavaProcessBuilder.

          Adds the arguments to the current List of arguments for the next Java Process to be realize()d by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder AbstractJavaProcessBuilder.addArguments(String... arguments)
          Adds the arguments to the current List of arguments for the next Java Process to be realize()d by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder JavaProcessBuilder.setCommands(List<String> commands)
          Sets operating system program and arguments for Java Processes realized by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder AbstractJavaProcessBuilder.setCommands(List<String> commands)
          Sets operating system program and arguments for Java Processes realized by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder JavaProcessBuilder.setCommands(String... commands)
          Sets operating system program and arguments for Java Processes realized by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder AbstractJavaProcessBuilder.setCommands(String... commands)
          Sets operating system program and arguments for Java Processes realized by this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder JavaProcessBuilder.setSystemProperty(String name, String value)
          Set the a system property to be used for the Java Processes realize()d with this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder AbstractJavaProcessBuilder.setSystemProperty(String name, String value)
          Set the a system property to be used for the Java Processes realize()d with this JavaProcessBuilder.
 JavaProcessBuilder JavaProcessBuilder.setWorkingDirectory(File directory)
          Set the JavaProcessBuilder working directory, that of which Java Processes realize()d with the said JavaProcessBuilder will use as their working directory.
 JavaProcessBuilder AbstractJavaProcessBuilder.setWorkingDirectory(File directory)
          Set the JavaProcessBuilder working directory, that of which Java Processes realize()d with the said JavaProcessBuilder will use as their working directory.
